The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 15 January is 2,885,082 (5,125.7 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 10 January, there were 333,706 new confirmed cases (592.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 03 January, there were 353,758 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 6% (20,052 fewer cases).
